egghead-course-banner.heading: Build a Modern User Interface with Chakra UI
egghead-course-banner.description: In this free course, you will learn the basics of Chakra UI and how to build well-designed, accessible user interfaces with speed!

carbon-ad.message: Start your application or marketing site with a growing collection of beautiful and responsive UI components.

tutorialError.title: Ooops something broke
tutorialError.heading: Ooops something broke 😭
tutorialError.message: You just found a really nasty issue. We are aware of it. Just hit 'Reload' and code on!
tutorialError.submessage: PS: Try to have no code selected in the sandbox before copying new code 😉
